name: Barbell full squat (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your upper back, resting it on your traps or rear delts.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to lower your body down.
Step:4 Bend at the knees and hips, pushing your hips back and down as if sitting into a chair.
Step:5 Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Keep your knees in line with your toes and your weight in your heels.
Step:7 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing calf raise (on a staircase)
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the edge of a step or a sturdy platform with your heels hanging off and your toes on the step.
Step:2 Hold onto a railing or wall for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Band step-up
instructions: Step:1 Place a band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:2 Stand facing a step or platform with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Step up onto the platform with your right foot, pushing through your heel.
Step:4 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Lower your left foot back down to the ground.
Step:6 Repeat with your left foot stepping up onto the platform.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing your torso to lean forward.
Step:3 Continue lowering the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Trap bar deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the trap bar on the ground in front of you.
Step:2 Bend at the hips and knees to lower yourself down and grip the handles of the trap bar with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and chest up as you begin to lift the trap bar off the ground by extending your hips and knees.
Step:4 As you lift, focus on driving through your heels and squeezing your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Lower the trap bar back down to the ground by bending at the hips and knees, keeping your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Glute-ham raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the glute-ham raise machine to fit your body.
Step:2 Position yourself face down on the machine with your ankles secured.
Step:3 Place your hands on your chest or cross them over your chest.
Step:4 Engage your hamstrings and glutes to lift your upper body up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Continue lifting until your body is in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sled hack squat
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a comfortable position for your height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform, toes slightly pointed outwards.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles or bars for stability.
Step:4 Lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:5 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to raise your body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Side lying hip adduction (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your bottom arm under your head for support.
Step:3 Engage your adductors and lift your top leg as high as possible without rotating your hips or leaning backward.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: Jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump explosively off the ground, extending your hips, knees, and ankles.
Step:4 While in mid-air, quickly bring your arms forward for balance.
Step:5 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately go into the next repetition.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever seated squat calf raise on leg press machine
nameEn: lever seated squat calf raise on leg press machine
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the footplate.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the footplate, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the footplate, keeping your heels off the edge.
Step:4 Release the safety handles and push the footplate away from you by extending your knees.
Step:5 Once your knees are fully extended, slowly lower your heels by flexing your calves.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the footplate back up by extending your calves.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Resistance band leg extension declined
instructions: Step:1 Attach the resistance band to a sturdy anchor point and secure it around your ankle.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your upper body stable, extend your leg straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return your leg to the starting position. Focus on declined movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: Smith leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and footplate of the smith machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet shoulder-width apart on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push the footplate away from you by extending your legs, keeping your back against the backrest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position.
Step:6 Slowly bend your knees and lower the footplate back towards you, returning to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Mountain climber
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and bring your right knee towards your chest, then quickly switch and bring your left knee towards your chest.
Step:3 Continue alternating legs in a running motion, keeping your hips low and your core engaged.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and breathe evenly throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Kettlebell pistol squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Lift your left foot off the ground and extend it forward, keeping it parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body down into a squat position, keeping your right foot flat on the ground and your left leg extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the squat, then push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: Box jump down with one leg stabilization
nameEn: box jump down with one leg stabilization
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a box or platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and jump onto the box, landing softly with one foot on the box and the other foot hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Stabilize yourself on the box with the foot that is on it, while keeping the other foot off the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, engaging your calf muscles to maintain balance.
Step:5 Slowly step down with the foot that is on the box, returning to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the exercise with the other leg.

name: Barbell side split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a barbell across your upper back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your body down into a squat position, bending at the knees and hips.
Step:4 As you lower, push your knees out to the sides and keep your weight on your heels.
Step:5 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable pull through (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grab the rope attachment with both hands and step forward, creating tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend at the hips and lower your upper body until it is parallel to the ground, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to pull your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sled calf press on leg press
nameEn: sled calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the sled, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Release the safety handles and push the sled away from you by extending your knees and ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the sled back down by bending your knees and ankles.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Sled calf press on leg press
nameEn: sled calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the sled, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Release the safety handles and push the sled away from you by extending your knees and ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the sled back down by bending your knees and ankles.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell upright row (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Let the dumbbells hang in front of your thighs, with your arms fully extended and your palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, exhale and lift the dumbbells straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Continue lifting until the dumbbells are at shoulder height, with your elbows pointing out to the sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable seated wide-grip row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the cable row machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with a wide overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward from the hips.
Step:4 Pull the handle towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the contraction.
Step:6 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable lat pulldown full range of motion
nameEn: cable lat pulldown full range of motion
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the lat pulldown machine with your knees positioned under the pads.
Step:2 Grasp the cable bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lean back slightly and keep your chest up, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the bar down towards your upper chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Archer pull up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your shoulder blades down and back.
Step:3 As you pull yourself up, bend one arm and bring your elbow towards your side, while keeping the other arm straight.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar and your bent arm is fully flexed.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down with control, straightening the bent arm and repeating the movement on the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides with each repetition.

name: Pull up (neutral grip)
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever back extension
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body size and range of motion.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet secured.
Step:3 Place your hands on the handles or grip bars.
Step:4 Engage your core and slowly lean forward, allowing your back to round slightly.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom position, feeling a stretch in your lower back.
Step:6 Using your back muscles, slowly raise your torso back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Exercise ball back extension with knees off ground
nameEn: exercise ball back extension with knees off ground
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and lie face down on top of it, with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Position your hands behind your head or crossed over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Smith bent over row with declined
nameEn: smith bent over row with declined
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the bar at hip height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Pull the bar towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Perform with declined intensity.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell seated shoulder press (parallel grip)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inward.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended overhead.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell rear lateral raise (support head)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell rear lateral raise (support head)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell push press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and dip your body down, then explosively extend your legs and press the dumbbells overhead.
Step:3 Lock out your arms at the top of the movement, then lower the dumbbells back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell front raise and pullover
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and raise the barbell in front of you until it reaches shoulder height.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Next, lower the barbell behind your head, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell standing front raise above head
nameEn: dumbbell standing front raise above head
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and lift the dumbbells in front of you, raising them above your head.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Lever triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and fully extend your arms in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the handles towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the handles back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell lying triceps extension double
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows. Focus on double movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell lying triceps extension double
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows. Focus on double movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable overhead triceps extension (rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and bring your hands above your head.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms close to your head and your elbows pointing forward.
Step:5 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell upright row (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Let the dumbbells hang in front of your thighs, with your arms fully extended and your palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, exhale and lift the dumbbells straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Continue lifting until the dumbbells are at shoulder height, with your elbows pointing out to the sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Wrist rollerer
instructions: Step:1 Attach a weight to one end of a rope or bar.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the rope or bar with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms fully extended in front of you.
Step:4 Slowly roll the weight up towards your hands by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell seated revers grip concentration curl
nameEn: dumbbell seated revers grip concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing up.
Step:2 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: Dumbbell seated palms up wrist curl
nameEn: dumbbell seated palms up wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell reverse preacher curl inclined
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad and your arms extended straight down, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell upward while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level. Perform with inclined intensity.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell standing alternate hammer curl and press
nameEn: dumbbell standing alternate hammer curl and press
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your back straight.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbell in your right hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the curl with your left hand.
Step:7 After completing the curl with your left hand, exhale and press the dumbbell in your right hand overhead.
Step:8 Extend your arm fully and hold for a moment at the top.
Step:9 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:10 Repeat the press with your left hand.
Step:11 Continue alternating between curls and presses for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Three bench dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Keep your upper arm close to your body and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Extend your forearm backward, straightening your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: Superman push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower your body, simultaneously lift your right arm and left leg off the ground, extending them straight out.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then lower your arm and leg back down while pushing yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time lifting your left arm and right leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you reach the top of the movement, transition your grip so that your palms are facing towards you.
Step:4 Continue pulling yourself up until your chest is above the bar and your arms are fully flexed.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by slowly lowering yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended along your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Contract your abs and curl your hips off the floor, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Reverse plank with leg lift
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you and your hands resting on the ground behind you, fingers pointing towards your feet.
Step:2 Press through your hands and lift your hips off the ground, coming into a reverse plank position.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift one leg off the ground, extending it straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Hold for a moment, then lower your leg back down.
Step:5 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Lean back slightly while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Hold your hands together in front of your chest or hold a weight if desired.
Step:4 Lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your sit bones.
Step:5 Twist your torso to the right, bringing your hands or weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing your hands or weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted side bend (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight in one hand and place your other hand on your hip.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly bend sideways towards the weighted side, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: Bodyweight incline side plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on the ground directly below your shoulder, with your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:5 Lower your hips back down to the ground and repeat on the other side.

name: Flexion leg sit up (bent knee)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 At the same time, lift your legs off the ground, bending your knees and bringing them towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Oblique crunches floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the floor, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the floor.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, alternating sides with each repetition.

name: Weighted front plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the floor.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ground, with your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight out behind you, with your toes on the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift your body off the ground, balancing on your forearms and toes.
Step:5 Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:6 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:7 Lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Assisted hanging knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core muscles and lift your knees towards your chest, bending at the hips and knees.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your abs.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Hanging leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Jackknife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Standing wheel rollerout
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing tall with your feet shoulder-width apart and the wheel roller in front of you.
Step:2 Bend at your waist and slowly roll the wheel forward, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Continue rolling forward until you feel a stretch in your abs and your body is extended as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the wheel back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Band bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating the twisting motion, as if you are pedaling a bicycle, while keeping your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Band bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating the twisting motion, as if you are pedaling a bicycle, while keeping your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands in front of your chest, keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Engage your core and twist your torso to the right, pulling the cable across your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, feeling the contraction in your abs and obliques.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position, resisting the cable's pull.
Step:6 Repeat the movement to the left side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cross body crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground and twist to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Weighted crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell on your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your shoulder blades are off the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Crunch (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie back on the ball until your lower back is supported and your upper body is parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:4 Engage your abs and lift your upper body towards your knees, curling your torso forward.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Decline crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body towards your knees, curling your torso.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Assisted hanging knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core muscles and lift your knees towards your chest, bending at the hips and knees.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your abs.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Hanging straight leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Walking lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right leg, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Keep your torso upright and your front knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and bring your left foot forward, stepping into a lunge position with your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs and walking forward, maintaining a controlled and steady pace.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Butterfly yoga pose
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring the soles of your feet together, allowing your knees to fall out to the sides.
Step:3 Hold onto your ankles or feet with your hands.
Step:4 Sit up tall and lengthen your spine.
Step:5 Gently press your knees down towards the floor, feeling a stretch in your inner thighs.
Step:6 Hold this position for a few breaths.
Step:7 To release, slowly bring your knees back up and extend your legs.

name: Barbell good morning
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and the barbell resting on your upper back.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge forward at the hips, pushing your buttocks back as if you were trying to touch the wall behind you with your glutes.
Step:3 Lower your torso until it is parallel to the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position by squeezing your glutes and pushing your hips forward.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Kettlebell alternating press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one kettlebell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the kettlebell back to shoulder height.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Jump rope
instructions: Step:1 Hold the handles of the jump rope with your hands, palms facing inward.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Swing the rope over your head and jump over it as it comes towards your feet.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet and repeat the jump as the rope comes around again.
Step:5 Continue jumping for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

name: Battling ropes
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold one end of the rope in each hand, with your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Raise your arms to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Begin making alternating waves with the ropes by rapidly raising and lowering each arm.
Step:5 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

name: Reclining big toe pose with rope
nameEn: reclining big toe pose with rope
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Loop the rope around the ball of your right foot and hold the ends of the rope with your hands.
Step:3 Slowly raise your right leg towards your chest, keeping your knee straight and your foot flexed.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Walk elliptical cross trainer
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

name: Push-up (wall)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back a few feet, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Push back up to the starting position, straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Close-grip push-up (on knees)
instructions: Step:1 Start by getting on your hands and knees, with your hands shoulder-width apart and your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause for a moment when your chest is just above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Plyo push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Push explosively off the ground, using your chest muscles to propel your upper body off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell incline bench press seated
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell incline bench press seated
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell incline bench press seated
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Dumbbell standing around world
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides at shoulder height, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly rotate your arms in a circular motion, bringing the dumbbells in front of your body and then overhead.
Step:4 Continue the circular motion, bringing the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell incline bench press seated
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable cross-over variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulleys to chest height.
Step:2 Stand in the center of the cable machine with one foot in front of the other.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:4 Take a step forward, keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:5 With a slight bend in your elbows, bring your hands together in front of your chest.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Chest dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:3 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Cable one arm decline chest fly
nameEn: cable one arm decline chest fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach a D-handle to a low pulley cable machine and set the bench to a decline angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your head towards the machine and grab the handle with your right hand.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:4 With a controlled motion, lower your arm out to the side until your hand is in line with your shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then reverse the motion and bring your arm back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to your left arm and repeat the exercise.

name: Lever seated squat calf raise on leg press machine
nameEn: lever seated squat calf raise on leg press machine
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the footplate.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the footplate, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the footplate, keeping your heels off the edge.
Step:4 Release the safety handles and push the footplate away from you by extending your knees.
Step:5 Once your knees are fully extended, slowly lower your heels by flexing your calves.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the footplate back up by extending your calves.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Contracted kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
nameEn: contracted kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Emphasize contracted control.

name: Muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you reach the top of the movement, transition your grip so that your palms are facing towards you.
Step:4 Continue pulling yourself up until your chest is above the bar and your arms are fully flexed.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by slowly lowering yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Exercise ball lat stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand and extend your arm straight up overhead.
Step:3 Slowly lean to the opposite side, feeling a stretch in your lat muscle.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: Burpee
instructions: Step:1 Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and placing your hands on the floor in front of you.
Step:3 Kick your feet back into a push-up position.
Step:4 Perform a push-up, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Jump your feet back into the squat position.
Step:6 Jump up explosively, reaching your arms overhead.
Step:7 Land softly and immediately lower back into a squat position to begin the next repetition.

name: Kettlebell swing
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointed slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold the kettlebell with both hands in front of your body, arms extended.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge at the hips, pushing your butt back.
Step:4 Swing the kettlebell back between your legs, keeping your arms straight and maintaining a flat back.
Step:5 Drive your hips forward and swing the kettlebell up to shoulder height, using the momentum generated by your hips.
Step:6 Allow the kettlebell to swing back down between your legs and repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Kettlebell turkish get up (squat style)
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back with your legs extended and the kettlebell held in your right hand, arm fully extended above your shoulder.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right foot flat on the ground, keeping your left leg extended.
Step:3 Pressing through your right foot, lift your hips off the ground, coming into a bridge position.
Step:4 Slide your left leg underneath your body, bending your left knee and placing your left foot flat on the ground.
Step:5 Rotate your torso to the left, bringing your left hand to the ground for support.
Step:6 Pressing through your right foot and left hand, lift your torso off the ground, coming into a kneeling position.
Step:7 From the kneeling position, stand up, keeping the kettlebell extended overhead.
Step:8 Reverse the movement to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat the exercise on the other side, starting with the kettlebell in your left hand.

name: Kipping muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your lats and biceps to initiate the movement.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Power clean
instructions: Step:1 Start with the barbell on the ground in front of you, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and chest up as you lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your mid-thigh, explosively pull it upwards, shrugging your shoulders and pulling your elbows high and to the sides.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it, rotating your elbows around and catching the barbell on your shoulders in a front squat position.
Step:6 Stand up with the barbell, fully extending your hips and knees.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position, keeping control of the weight throughout the movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, bending it at the elbow.
Step:3 Place your opposite hand on the bent elbow and gently pull it towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, feeling a gentle stretch in your triceps.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other arm.

name: Handstand push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a wall and face away from it, standing a few feet away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart and kick your feet up against the wall, coming into a handstand position.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your head towards the ground, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Push through your hands and extend your arms to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: High knee against wall
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your right knee up towards your chest, while keeping your left foot on the ground.
Step:4 Quickly switch legs, bringing your left knee up towards your chest and lowering your right foot back down.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs in a running motion, bringing your knees up as high as possible.
Step:6 Maintain a fast pace and keep your upper body stable throughout the exercise.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired duration or number of repetitions.
